expires.description: Number of seconds for which the policy should be valid.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request property "expires" should be a number.

key.description: Key under which object is stored.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request property "key" should be a string.

responseContentDisposition.description: Sets the Content-Disposition header of the response.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request property "responseContentDisposition" should be a string.

responseContentType.description: Sets the Content-Type header of the response.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request property "responseContentType" should be a string.

versionId.description: VersionId used to reference a specific version of the object.

errorMessage.type: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request property "versionId" should be a string.
AwsS3PresignedGetObject request properties should be an object.
errorMessage.required: AwsS3PresignedGetObject request should have required property "key".
